eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq:Ci}
&&W_{\rm eff}={\rm Res}_\infty (z \,Udx)= 
-\sum_i \left( \int_{A_i+A_i^*} z\,U dx + \int_{B_i+B_i^*} z\,U dx \right)
\nonumber \\
&& = -\sum_i \left( \int_{A_i}(z+\tau)U(x_0+i\frac{m}{2})+\int_{A_i^*} z\,U(x_0-i
\frac{m}{2}) dx - \int_{B_i} U dx \right )\nonumber\\
&& = -\sum_i\left(\int_{C_i}z W'(x)dx - \int_{B_i}U(x)dx\right) \nonumber\\
&& = \sum_i \left(\int_{C_i} W(x)dz\right) + N\int_{-im/2}^{im/2}U(x)dx \ .
\
